title: Another book request
author: VD
content_html:
Does anyone have Stephen Runciman’s three-volume history of the Crusades? If so, please let me know here and I’ll email you. Mine are in a box somewhere and I need to look something up. Thanks.

Things are going very well, by the way. I’m pushing 69k words now and should have the first draft wrapped up before the end of the month.
content_text:
Does anyone have Stephen Runciman’s three-volume history of the Crusades?  If so, please let me know here and I’ll email you.  Mine are in a box somewhere and I need to look something up.  Thanks.
Things are going very well, by the way.  I’m pushing 69k words now and should have the first draft wrapped up before the end of the month.
